title: New client is slow and causing lag in-game
body:
So I have no idea what's going on, but the client right now Is very slow...
When I get invited to a game and I accept it takes a good minute to actually put me into the lobby, when we queue up it takes another good 1 minute for the queue to start for me, the queue pops for other people earlier than mine does and by the time mine pops my ban/pick a champion timer has ran out and I've dodged without even knowing it and I get a 5 min ban, now I've got a 15 min ban because it happened twice in a row.
I know that it's not only me experiencing this I even have friends that have this problem, but the weird thing is that when 1 of my friends had this problem I didn't have it, and when I got this problem my friend's problem was there no more. It even causes in-game delay/lag which is very annoying when I'm trying to do... anything like play the game for f's sake.
Client lag and unresponsiveness has been happening for about 2-3 days now and it's just unplayable, some people even tried the repair tool and it didn't help at all.
Does anyone know what's going on?

replies.body: I cant play LoL couse the client lags like hell and this continues for like 2 weeks the only way to play for me is via VPN. Any fixes ?
I have the exact same thing rn and this post is like 5 months old. whenever i close the client while  being in game i dont experience lag at all but if its open im at like 120 ping
Yep, I'm having that issue too but after closing the client during a game the lag dissapears mostly.

Yeah for some reason I'm having FPS drops down to 5-20fps (before the patch it was 120+ ez) and major client lag since the 7.13 patch. All my drivers are updated and It's not the internet connection because my ping stays around 35-40ms. RIOT HELP!

It sounds like your network is degrading, and struggling to reach our services.  This can cause you to lose sync or even left behind during champion select, as well as in-game.  

My suggestion would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  The HRT can fix game file problems, but not necessarily connection.  That guide should do the trick!
i am having the same issues on NA servers since patch 7.13, prior to this patch i was not experiencing any of the afore mentioned issues

This patch (7.13) is definitely bugged. I hardly manage to log-in, then the button Play is grayed out. this issue came with the patch. I also would like to know if its possible to install the hextech repair tool on a user-specified drive, and if not - when will this be implemented?
